Name: Really Bad Flying Machine
About the game: Really Bad Flying Machine is a challenging puzzle game. You play as a flying machine that was assembled in a factory but was disposed of because of a defect. You use your abnormal features to find your way back up. Find and collect keys to activate elevators. Shoot your own propellers off to break boxes and open paths. Look for secrets in hidden paths. Features: Challenging Puzzles: Each puzzle contains 1 key. Shoot your propellers to break boxes. Once you shoot a propeller, you lose the ability to move to that direction. Hidden Secrets: There are gold keys placed in some areas of the game. There are also secrets that you can find and reveal parts of the story.
